articles.title: Asian shares retreat, tracking tech losses on Wall Street
articles.summary: Asian shares have retreated, tracking a decline on Wall Street led by technology shares including Nvidia and other stars that have been riding the mania surrounding artificial-intelligence.

articles.title: Asian Shares Retreat, Tracking Tech Losses on Wall Street
articles.summary: TOKYO (AP) — Asian shares retreated on Wednesday, tracking a decline on Wall Street led by technology shares including Nvidia and other stars that have been riding the mania surrounding artificial-intelligence.

articles.title: Vantage Data Centers plans $25 billion AI campus in Texas
articles.summary: Vantage Data Centers said on Tuesday it would spend more than $25 billion to build a 1,200-acre data center campus in Shackelford County, Texas, as surging demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure fuels mega-scale developments.

articles.title: More people trust AI instead of friends for shopping opinions, expert says
articles.summary: As people in DC region finish up their back-to-school shopping ahead of the first day of class, many of them may be turning to artificial intelligence for opinions.

articles.title: 5 Actors Join Luca Guadagnino's OpenAI Movie Artificial Cast
